SEARCH
Package net.tangly.ui.app.domain

Interface BoundedDomainUi

public interface BoundedDomainUi
Define the interface for the visualization of a bounded domain. The user interface is a set of views to display entities, commands, and dialogs to modify entities.

    • name

      String name()
      Return the name of bounded domain user interface as displayed in the user interface.
      Returns:
      name of the bounded domain

    • select

      void select(@NotNull @NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.applayout.AppLayout layout, @NotNull @NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.menubar.MenuBar menuBar)
      Select the view to be displayed from the bounded domain user interface and update the menu to reflect the bounded domain.
      Parameters:
      layout - layout in which the view will be displayed
      menuBar - empty menu bar of the layout

    • select

      void select(@NotNull @NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.applayout.AppLayout layout, com.vaadin.flow.component.Component view)
      Select the new current view of the bounded domain interface.
      Parameters:
      layout - layout to display within
      view - new current view if not null otherwise the current view is refrested

    • addAdministration

      default void addAdministration(@NotNull @NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.applayout.AppLayout layout, @NotNull @NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.menubar.MenuBar menuBar, @NotNull @NotNull net.tangly.core.domain.BoundedDomain<?,?,?,?> domain, @NotNull @NotNull DomainView domainView, Cmd loadDialog)
      Administration menu provides standard administration operation for a bounded domain.
      • Provides statistics about entities of the domain.
      • Import domain entities from a set of TSV files stored in a directory.
      • Export domain entities to a set of TSV files stored in a directory. Existing files are overwritten.
      • Up load domain entities through the browser interface. Files are available on client site.

    • addAnalytics

      default void addAnalytics(@NotNull @NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.applayout.AppLayout layout, @NotNull @NotNull com.vaadin.flow.component.menubar.MenuBar menuBar, @NotNull @NotNull AnalyticsView analyticsView)
